name: I Love Bootstrap!
content: I have always dreaded doing the CSS for my projects. I'm so glad that I found Bootstrap! It has made the styling process SOOOO much easier. If you're like me and struggle with CSS, you should give Bootstrap a shot too!

name: I need some help with npm packages
content: Can anyone clarify how to install an npm package? I'm new to node and some basic concepts are still unclear to me. I've already initialized the package.json. What is the next step?

name: JavaScript Built-In Method of the Day
content: Today's built-in method is charAt. Ever have trouble identifying a character in a string? Well charAt is the method for you! charAt is a method that returns the character from the specified index. The syntax is: string.charAt(index);
